title: Ep. 319: The Scalp Therapist Will See You Now with Bridgette Hill
itunes:title: Ep. 319: The Scalp Therapist Will See You Now with Bridgette Hill
itunes:subtitle: Trichologist Bridgette Hill explains her holistic approach to hair health, which takes into account ingredient allergies, medications, vitamin and mineral deficiencies, hormonal issues, and so much more. If you're dealing with (or want to prevent!...
description:
Trichologist Bridgette Hill explains her holistic approach to hair health, which takes into account ingredient allergies, medications, vitamin and mineral deficiencies, hormonal issues, and so much more. If you're dealing with (or want to prevent!) hair issues like hair loss, thinning, bald patches, flakes, oiliness, dryness, or dullness, then this interview is a must listen. -- For links, products, and sponsors mentioned in this episode: fatmascara.com/blog; To shop the products: myshlf.us/fatmascara; Our private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation & be featured on a future episode: +1 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
